Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the Civil Service Commission (CSC) did not issue any directive to pass examinees without taking the actual test.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that civil service examinees affected by COVID-19 automatically passed the test.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that all examinees affected by COVID-19 were automatically passed without any official announcement or directive from the CSC.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the claim is false and is a result of fake news circulating online. The CSC has explicitly stated that there is no existing policy to consider examinees as automatically passed due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
